name: 洪媽益
objective: 培養正確的英語發音與腔調，並訓練學生熟悉如何使用音標記錄發音以及辨認學習者在英語發音中經常發生的問題。  課程中也介紹英語語音系統的主要規則。
schedule:
Week 1 Introduction
Week 2 Sounds and Languages
Week 3 Speech Organs
Week 4 IPA transcription
Weeks 5-8 Consonant sounds
Week 9 Mid-term exams
Weeks 10-12 Vowel sounds
Week 13 Movie, My Fair Lady
Week 14 Putting Vowels and Consonants Together
Weeks 15-17 Suprasegmental Features and Phonics
Week 18 Final exams
scorePolicy:
Quizzes and Exercises 40%
Mid-term Exam 30%
Final Exam 30%
materials:
Ladefoged, Peter. 2006. A course in Phonetics. Fifth Edition. Boston: Thomson.
Ladefoged, Peter. 2004. Vowels and consonants. Second Edition. Boston: Thomson.

Available at Crane Publishing (02) 2393-4497
